attributes.action: watch transformers at least once a week, in order to make himself, and the whole nation, that little bit happier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Transformers was a great film. It makes me happier just thinking about it. So i think that the Prime Minister would be so much happier, and would make happy choices, if he watched this film more often.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
